pullRequest.title: Fix privacy enclave keystore password file reading eol issue
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR description
-- Fix privacy enclave keystore password file reading eol issue
-- Read password from first line instead of reading whole file as bytes
-- Raise appropriate exceptions if file is empty or only contains eol as first line.
Fixed Issue(s)
fixes #525
Signed-off-by: Usman Saleem usman@usmans.info

commit.message:
Fix privacy enclave keystore password file reading eol issue

 -- Read password from first line instead of reading whole file as bytes
 -- Raise appropriate exceptions if file is empty or only contains eol as first line.

Signed-off-by: Usman Saleem <usman@usmans.info>

updating build.gradle to include missing assertj dependencies

Signed-off-by: Usman Saleem <usman@usmans.info>

nodes.bodyText: so we only read the first line?
